alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 6:55PM EST until January 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Webster, Northwest Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will continue to blow and drift snow. Visibilities may be temporarily reduced. Drifting snow may recover roads. Hazardous travel will continue.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster
